title: Add search result focus navigation to DAG
description:
Enhance issue search to automatically focus on search results in the DAG visualization. When a search result is clicked:

1. **Center the DAG** on the found issue node
2. **Expand all collapsed clusters** in the path to make the issue visible

Also added a 'Focus in Graph' button to the issue detail panel for quick navigation.

Implementation:
- Search result click handler extracts issue ID and triggers focus
- Graph expansion logic recursively expands parent clusters (handles nested hierarchies)
- ReactFlow viewport centering using fitView
- Generic focusNodeId API enables reuse from multiple UI components (search, detail panel)

Improves UX by eliminating manual navigation after search or when viewing issue details.
